definition: Asa (?-870 BC), third king of Judah and fifth king of the House of David (Judaism)
to let go/to cast/to let loose/to discharge/to give expression to

sentences.english: Asa cut down her image, crushed it, and burned it at the brook Kidron.
sentences.chinese: 亚撒砍下他的偶像，捣得粉碎，烧在汲沦溪边。

sentences.english: In the twentieth year of Jeroboam king of Israel, Asa began to reign over Judah.
sentences.chinese: 以色列王耶罗波安二十年，亚撒登基作犹大王。

sentences.english: And there was war between Asa and Baasha king of Israel all their days.
sentences.chinese: 亚撒和以色列王巴沙在世的日子常常争战。

sentences.english: Asa cut the pole down, broke it up and burned it in the Kidron Valley.
sentences.chinese: 亚撒砍下她的偶像，捣得粉碎，烧在汲沦溪边。

sentences.english: Asa was angry with the seer because of this; he was so enraged that he put him in prison.
sentences.chinese: 亚撒因此恼恨先见，将他囚在监里。

sentences.english: 13 and Asa and his army pursued them as far as Gerar.
sentences.chinese: 亚撒和跟随他的军兵追赶他们，直到基拉耳。

sentences.english: And there was no more war until the thirty-fifth year of the reign of Asa.
sentences.chinese: 从这时直到亚撒三十五年，都没有争战的事。

sentences.english: There was war between Asa and Baasha king of Israel throughout their reigns.
sentences.chinese: 亚撒和以色列王巴沙在世的日子常常争战。

sentences.english: Baasha killed Nadab in the third year of Asa king of Judah and succeeded him as king.
sentences.chinese: 在犹大王亚撒第三年巴沙杀了他，篡了他的位。

sentences.english: Even in the third year of Asa king of Judah did Baasha slay him, and reigned in his stead.
sentences.chinese: 在犹大王亚撒第三年巴沙杀了他，篡了他的位。

sentences.english: In the twenty and seventh year of Asa king of Judah did Zimri reign seven days in Tirzah.
sentences.chinese: 犹大王亚撒二十七年，心利在得撒作王七日。

definition: Cain (name)/Cain (biblical character), a figure of Judeo-Christian-Muslim mythology
Abe (short form for Abraham)/Abel, a figure of Jewish, Christian and Muslim mythologies
Logue or Rogge (name)/Jacques Rogge, president of International Olympic Committee (IOC)
Lucifer (Satan's name before his fall in Jewish and Christian mythology)
